name: eAbacus Communications
overview: eAbacus Communications is a full-service Search Engine Marketing, Internet Marketing and web design and hosting company. Our business is located in Macedonia, our goal is to be one of the best in world. eAbacus Communications represents a final materialization of an old idea that has been growing and upgrading in the past several years so that it could evolve into the company that it is now. A team of young professionals have been thinking long and hard to come up with ways that will implement and upgrade the internet advertising, locally and around the world. We have gained a lot of knowledge and experience, we have studied to become certified, and we have made a lot of connections with many world and local authorities in order to offer you all of this in a form of services and solutions suited to your needs. Innovation, quality, alternative approach and low fees are the pillars upon which our corporation is founded. Our purpose is to allow each and every interested individual that is aware of benefits of eMarketing to represent and improve their business in the best way possible.
